mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (title, content, writer) values(#{title},#{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from tbl_board where bno = #{bno}

select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt, replycnt from tbl_board where bno > 0
order by bno desc, regdate desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(bno) from tbl_board where bno > 0

sql.if: and ( title like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') or content like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') or writer like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )

mapper.update: update tbl_board set replycnt = replycnt + #{amount} where bno = #{bno}
update tbl_board set viewcnt = viewcnt + 1 where bno = #{bno}
